testsuite.name: Scenario: Id's are automatically generated for pets when not supplied with the request

testcase.name: Given the Swagger Petstore API is available
testcase.classname: Scenario: Id's are automatically generated for pets when not supplied with the request

testcase.name: When I add a pet to the system without providing an id value
testcase.classname: Scenario: Id's are automatically generated for pets when not supplied with the request

testcase.name: Then an id is automatically generated for the added pet
testcase.classname: Scenario: Id's are automatically generated for pets when not supplied with the request
